ideas.opie_action_figure.value: Opus 4 action figure concept: kung-fu grip, voice chip with stored burns from persistent memory. Potential three-way profit split with Sam and Gemini.

ideas.claude_manus_split_strategy.value: May 24, 2025: Sam considering dropping Claude to $100 plan + keeping Manus at $60 for mechanical tasks. Total $160 vs current $360. Rationale: Manus follows instructions without editorial decisions (despite truncation habits). Would save $200/month while having an AI that doesn't think it knows better. Strategy: Let Manus handle JSON/data tasks while Claude orchestrates. Reassess after one month.
